title.native: 百千さん家のあやかし王子
title.english: The Demon Prince of Momochi House

description:
Himari’s 16th birthday will be one she never forgets. Unexpectedly, she receives a will detailing her inheritance of a mysterious estate: the Momochi House. She arrives only to discover that the home was built on the cusp between the human world and the spiritual realm. There, she encounters Yukari, Ise, and a peculiar boy named Aoi, who seems to be concealing a shadowy secret.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #百千さん家のあやかし王子 #ももちさん #momochisan

tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

node.description: __Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡真里子)

Originating from Studio Live. Notable works as a character designer include [Jigoku Shoujo](https://anilist.co/anime/228/), [Ghost Hound](https://anilist.co/anime/2596/) and [Nurarihyon no Mago](https://anilist.co/anime/7592/). Close friends with [Hiroshi Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/101189/), and often designs the characters for the shows which he directs.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuki_Jouet) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoh_kamiyama/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw1U9K3S8WVWp7REGaHIW0A) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/uki3) | [Website](https://yohkamiyama.com/) | [Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E7%BE%8A)

Yoh Kamiyama is a singer, lyricist, composer and arranger signed to Sony Music Associated Records.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/temnem_sui) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/muto.k___/) | [TikTok]() | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@muto.k___) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/38gt1AsY6ZhEtrOP7e94ui)**

Muto, is a female vocalist, utaite and guitarist. She began her music journey in 2018 by posting cover videos and solo acoustic performances on YouTube and social media. She has also participated in various collaborations and featured appearances, and her clear and transparent vocals have gained a large following among young people.

In March 2023, she joined as a featured artist for the theme song of the Nippon Television drama "Numaru. Minato-ku Joshikosei" titled, [Ibitsunakokoro](https://youtu.be/7SufPQo1DGE).
Audio and ADR Engineer affiliated with Crunchyroll
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
Samantha Herek is a producer and actress.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuuta16597) | [ArtStation](https://www.artstation.com/yuuta16597) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10832778/artworks) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuuta16597/)

Freelance Vietnamese animator and founder of Suzuhana Studio.
